detail_desc: Fitted T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Sandals with hook and loop fasteners, imitation suede linings and insoles, and cork and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, padded shoulders, a pleat at the back and flap front pockets. Lined.
Short kimono in a textured, crinkled viscose weave with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, pompoms at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Sandals in imitation suede with lacing at the front, a high shaft with hole-patterned sides, and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 9 cm.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Pull-on jeans in supersoft denim with a drawstring waist, side pockets and back pockets. Zip fly with a press-stud and slim legs with straight hems.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy cotton weave with a print and appliqués. Stand-up collar, detachable hood and zip at the front with a wind flap and press-studs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, ribbed inner cuffs and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a fine, rib-knit cotton and viscose blend. Collar, a V-shaped opening with decorative buttons at the front and long sleeves.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Shorts in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Double-layered hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.

Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with embroidered text on the back and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and elastication at the hem. Pile lining.
Calf-length dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long sleeves and a wrapover front with wide ties at one side.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a hood and flatlock seams. No buttons.
Metal earrings in various designs, three pairs with fabric tassels.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a smocked stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
V-neck blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a smocked seam under the bust and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with a wide waistband for a more comfortable fit and sewn-in creases down the legs.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a V-neck with a discreet lace trim.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Baby Exclusive Top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with pompoms front and back and concealed press-studs at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Chinos in soft washed cotton twill with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Double-layered hats in soft cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, brushed cotton jersey with a hood, print motif, gathered seam at the hips and gently flared skirt.
Sleeveless tops in soft slub cotton jersey with gathered frills and elastication around the neckline and armholes.
Sleeveless top in satin with lace details and a deep V-neck front and back.
Sandals with glittery straps in woven fabric. Hook and loop fasteners and a small platform. Textured insoles and soles. Platform approx. 3 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Small shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a flap and magnetic fastener. Narrow metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 7.5x15.5x17.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves and a hood with a pompom on top. Ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, short butterfly sleeves and an open section at the back with wide ties at the hem.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short sleeves with a drawstring. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Boxy-style top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and elastication and a wide flounce around the neckline. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist. Unlined.
Warm-lined ankle boots with appliqués, a zip at one side and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slim-fit trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Fully lined textured bikini top with wide shoulder straps and concealed elastication at the hem.
Fitted coat in woven fabric with a tuxedo-style collar, jetted front pockets, detachable tie belt at the waist, a slit at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted vest top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend.
Trousers in a patterned weave with a high waist that is elasticated at the back, side pockets, a fake fly and straight, wide legs.
Cropped top in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Round neckline, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Trims around the neckline and cuffs.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with adjustable, double shoulder straps and padded, triangular cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a lace yoke at the top and small frill trim that continues over the shoulders. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long sleeves with a frill trim and button at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped, lined skirt.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress with a round neckline, lace top and concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt in sturdy jersey. Partly lined at the top in jersey.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in an airy cotton weave with flounced shoulder straps, elastication at the top, press-studs at the crotch and narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the hems.
Short jacket in a felted weave with contrasting-colour seams, a small stand-up collar and detachable tie belt at the waist. Large patch pockets at the front and no buttons. Unlined.
Ankle boots with pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, front pockets and a tie belt at the waist.
T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a lightly brushed finish.
Short dress in a textured, cotton-blend weave with a V-neck, long sleeves with gathers on the shoulders and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Short, 4-pocket skirt in sturdy, washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button and a raw-edge, cut-off hem. Some of the cotton content of the skirt is recycled.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Strapless, non-wired bandeau bra in cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Side support with decorative gathers. No fasteners.
Top in textured jersey made from a cotton blend with a boat neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, print motif on the front and dropped shoulders.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in softly draping silk with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps and a high slit and draping at the front.
Hair elastics decorated with faux fur pompoms.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with short, flounced sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist and gathered frills at the hems.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a wrapover front with a decorative bow at one side.
Straight-cut, relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft pima cotton jersey containing some silk.
Earrings in metal and plastic with a large, rectangular pendant. Length 7 cm.
